game.short_description: Work in Progress. You have stranded on the planet Hades. Use your limited supplies to survive and use terraforming to create a beautiful habitable place. (EARLY TEST VERSION)

long_description:
Fork of original [wateringcan](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/wateringcan/) mod with added support or Hades Revisited and added APi for registering new wettable nodes by another mods.

A watering can to wetten soil.
Composting supported this mod.
name: wateringcan
short_description: A watering can to wetten soil. Support for Hades Revisited. Supported by composting.
title: Watering Can
